net.sf.excelutils

类 ExcelUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.excelutils.ExcelUtils

  • public class ExcelUtils
extends java.lang.Object

    ExcelUtils is a class which parse the excel report template

    版本:
    $Revision: 112 $ $Date: 2006-08-22 18:54:05 +0800 (星期二, 22 八月 2006) $
    作者:
    rainsoft

      • export

        public static void export(javax.servlet.ServletContext ctx,
          java.lang.String config,
          java.lang.Object context,
          java.io.OutputStream out)
                   throws ExcelException
        parse the excel template and output excel to outputStream.
        参数:
        ctx - ServletContext
        config - Excel Template Name
        context - All Data
        out - OutputStream
        抛出:
        ExcelException
